name: Kinetix
description: Kinetix Finance's DEX is a decentralized exchange platform allowing users to trade cryptocurrencies seamlessly.

name: Curve
description: Curve is DeFi’s leading AMM, (Automated Market Maker). Hundreds of liquidity pools have been launched through Curve’s factory and incentivized by Curve’s DAO.

name: Sushi
description: A leading multi-chain DEX deployed across 25+ blockchains, cooking up a community-built, open-source ecosystem of all the DeFi tools you need.

name: Beefy Finance
description: The Multichain Yield Optimizer that autocompounds your crypto on BSC, Polygon, Fantom, HECO and Avalanche.

name: Stargate Finance
description: Stargate is a fully composable liquidity transfer protocol at the heart of full-chain DeFi

name: Equilibre Finance
description: Équilibre Finance is a financial platform that focuses on providing decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions.

name: Hover
description: Hover Market is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that provides an overview of various DeFi services and products.

name: Wagmi
description: Wagmi's platform allows users to trade and swap cryptocurrencies through a decentralized interface.

name: Squidrouter
description: Squid Router is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform designed to facilitate cross-chain swaps. It allows users to seamlessly exchange assets across different blockchain networks, offering a user-friendly interface for secure and efficient transactions.

name: Kava
description: The Kava app offers protocols decentralized lending and borrowing, liquidity mining, earning rewards with BUSD, and liquid staking of KAVA.
